sense.name: Orally relate letters or give the spelling of; write or name the letters that comprise the conventionally accepted form of.
sense.examples: How do you spell this word? We had to spell out our names for the police officer. He spelled the word wrong in his letter.

sense.name: Indicate or signify.
sense.examples: This spells trouble. It spelled a huge change in company policy.

sense.name: Relieve someone from work by taking a turn; take turns working.
sense.examples: She spelled her husband at the wheel. The workers spell every four hours.

sense.name: Explain in detail.
sense.examples: Do I have to spell out everything for you in this job? You should spell out your demands.

sense.name: Spell fully and without abbreviating.
sense.examples: Please spell out your middle name instread of giving just the initials. NASA had once considered spelling out the full name of the organization on all correspondence.
